burlap.behavior.singleagent.auxiliary.valuefunctionvis.common

Class LandmarkColorBlendInterpolation

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.singleagent.auxiliary.valuefunctionvis.common.LandmarkColorBlendInterpolation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ColorBlend

    public class LandmarkColorBlendInterpolation
extends java.lang.Object
implements ColorBlend
    A ColorBlend instance that takes as input a set of "landmark" Color objects and corresponding values between them. For a given value, it interpolates between the two landmarks values than lower bound and upper bound the input. The interpolation is by default linear. However, it can also be specified to first find the normalized distance between the bounding landmark values and raise it to a power, which may produce more obvious perceptual changes to small changes in value.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan
